新研究揭示了抗癌药如何进入癌细胞一项新的研究表明，抗癌药物如何触发“外部”信号，使其吸入癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/new-study-reveals-how-anow-nationancer-drugs-enter-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/new-study-reveals-how-nowancer-nationancer-drugs-enter-cancer-cellsers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01F91458-5D50-4CB7-AEA0-9990D50531AF Wed, 05 Feb 2025 06:56:51 -0500 New study reveals how anticancer drugs enter cancer cells
洗涤，干燥，注册：在自助洗衣店找到医疗补助帮助在华盛顿特区南部的超级自助洗衣店中，稳定的顾客在最近的一个星期天早晨将衣服装进垫圈和干衣机，在手机上度过了时间或看电视。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/wash-dry-enroll-finding-medicaid-help-at-the-laundromat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/wash-dry-enroll-finding-medicaid-medicaid-help-at-the-laundromat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51EF6AB6-2AC4-4A59-A087-A087-9BA143792674 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 06:41:39 -0500 Wash, dry, enroll: Finding Medicaid help at the laundromat

成人空气污染与下呼吸道感染之间的联系研究表明，即使是低水平的空气污染也会显着增加成人呼吸道感染的风险，强调紧急健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/the-link-between-air-air-pollution-and-pollution-and-lower-rower-respiratory-infections-in-odults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/the-link-between-air-pollution-and-pollution-and-lower-rower-respiratory-infections-infections-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3DD191DC-2107-4152-9F75-96ACE4C72CE6 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 06:31:00 -0500 The link between air pollution and lower respiratory infections in adults
加拿大与酒精相关的死亡和住院治疗在19日大流行期间激增与酒精相关的健康问题在COVID-19-19大流行期间激增，死亡率增长了17.6％，呼吁提高预防和治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/alcohol-realated-deaths-and-hospitalizations-in-canada-canada-surged-surged-the-covid-the-covid-the-covid-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/alcohol-realated-deaths-and-hospitalizations-in-canada-sured-surged-the-covid-the-covid-covid-covid-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cbf1105-A90A-4247-4247-8912-11D67E4657B0 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 05:53:00 -0500 Alcohol-related deaths and hospitalizations in Canada surged during the COVID-19 pandemic
Optibrium扩大了对行业领先的对接方法的访问Optibrium是软件和分子设计的AI解决方案的领先开发人员，今天宣布为Surflex-Dock推出新的Pymol图形用户界面（GUI），这是其基于行业领先的结构设计方法，该方法是该公司生物武器3D的一部分分子建模套件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/optibrium-widens-access-access-to-industry-leading-docking-method.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/optibrium-widens-access-to-to-industry-leading-docking-method-method.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=299d76-5A8F-4B4F-4B4F-8C8C82-07776291CFD98 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 05:52:00 -0500 Optibrium widens access to industry-leading docking method
CN BIO启动Physiomimix dili分析套件：人类24，用于增强临床前毒理学测试CN Bio是加速药物发现和开发工作流程的有机芯片（OOC）系统和解决方案的领先提供商，今天宣布推出其Physiomimix®DiliAssay Assay Kit：Human 24。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/cn-bio-launches-physiomimimimix-dili-aseay-kit-kit-kit-human-24-for--------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/cn-bio-launches-physiomimimix-dili-aseay-kit-kit-kit-kit-human-24-for---------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=486c9856-eaff-4783-bdb6-edaee6e492eb Wed, 05 Feb 2025 05:52:00 -0500 CN Bio launches physioMimix DILI assay kit: Human 24, for enhanced preclinical toxicology testing
认知行为疗法可以量身定制以优化多动症治疗吗？ 43个试验的荟萃分析确定了关键的CBT组件，包括第三波疗法和组织策略，可有效地管理多动症症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/can-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-therapy-components-bebe be-be-be-be-optimize-aptimize-adhd-wartment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250205/can-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-therapy-components-be-be-be-be-be-optimize-Adhd-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fae482ff-b5cd-4de8-b379-1377DC29D176 Wed, 05 Feb 2025 05:06:00 -0500 Can cognitive-behavioral therapy components be tailored to optimize ADHD treatment?
